author: InternationalArmy175
comment: It’s from the max score. So if 50 is full marks, then minus 5.

author: zzzz_ee
comment: It's from max score: if you get 30/50, it'll be 25/50 after penalty. To be sure, read the student handbook or assessment doc very carefully.
